prompt: Create a catchy, modern pop song with clear drums, bass, synths, and melody. Include the provided lyric lines as sung vocals, with a strong chorus and a clean build/drop. Keep it production-ready for judging playback.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
AWay of prizes came alive, organizers set the track for the night.
AWS, Datadog, Neo4j, MiniMax, TestSprite lights.

[Verse 2]
Some hands were blocked on Bedrock, permissions made the setup feel tight.
IAM gates and marketplace errors, still we kept the team on tight.

[Pre-Chorus]
Questions hit the table: support lines where they could route and guide.
Inference kept the model humming while deployment sometimes got denied.

[Chorus]
Submit link and demo to the form, plus tracks and product answers true,
The graph holds the facts and the beats all the way through.

[Verse 3]
When EC2 and ECS were locked, we shifted plans and worked as one.
CopilotKit changed its prize and top teams caught the Ray-Ban sun.

[Outro]
From raw fact to final run, observability in the flow,
Lyrebird turns chaos into rhythm, letting every logbeat glow.
